name: Possession Party
description:
A Tower Defense game in which you possess the ability to possess your turrets. Possessed turrets have double range.

CHANGELOG

v0.0.5:

- Added some levels

- Fixed camera angles when possessing a turret

v0.0.4:

- Added levels

- Added waves

- Added a pause and victory menu

v0.0.3:

- Added instructions and settings

- Added a range indicator

- Added a terrain

- Added camera control (WASD)
